content.p: Welcome to the School of Humanitiesâ€”a vibrant, interdisciplinary institution where media, communication, culture, and language come together to create a rich educational experience. We offer undergraduate degrees, postgraduate degrees and personalised research opportunities designed to equip you with the practical, creative, and analytical skills essential for success in diverse careers. A degree from the School of Humanities opens the door to a wide range of rewarding careers. Graduates in international communications find opportunities in the digital and print media industries, as well as in marketing, production, public relations, and research. Beyond media, humanities graduates are well-suited for careers in arts administration, civil service, diplomacy, NGO work, and consulting within international business. English graduates, in particular, enjoy diverse career options, from advertising, banking, and broadcasting to law, lecturing, publishing, and teaching. With a strong foundation in creative, analytical, and communication skills, humanities graduates are equipped to thrive in the dynamic, evolving workplace of the 21st century. Join us and start shaping your future today! telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8693 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
